description: The image shows a close-up of a modern digital radio tuned to BBC Radio 4. The radio, branded 'PURE', features a digital display showing the time as 23:22 and the text 'Newsnight Lebanon'. It has several control buttons for menu, info, autotune, and record, as well as a revu/snooze button. The radio's design includes a white casing and two small speakers on the front, with a textured pattern in the background.
poem:
A radio on the desk does stand,
Tuned to news from a distant land.
At night it plays, without any fuss,
Voices clear, broadcasting to us.
In the quiet, its stories expand.
